des: "Delicious, easy-to-make treat adults will love as much as kids!"
ins:
Cut marshmallows in half.
Melt chocolate-hazelnut spread in a microwave-safe bowl, about 30 seconds.
Pour cereal in a bowl; place a baking sheet alongside.
Dunk each marshmallow half in chocolate-hazelnut spread, then coat with rice cereal. Place on the baking sheet; freeze until firm, about 30 minutes.
